sentences.en: In 1995, Dayang launched its own flagship brand of Trands menswear.
sentences.cn: 1995年, 大杨推出了自有旗舰品牌“创世”男装.

sentences.en: Knitwear and Knitted Fabrics, Women Wear, Menswear, Ladieswear, Knitwear, Garments.
sentences.cn: 采购产品针织物和针织布, 女装,男人服装, 女装, 针织物, 衣服.

sentences.en: Oversize watchesare a alternativea cuff or bangle, and menswear in spiredshoes offer a quirky touch.
sentences.cn: 超大手表是袖口或者手镯的上佳更调品, 以男装为灵感预设的鞋子展示出一种别样的风纪.

sentences.en: The whole range of menswear, including accessories , sports - and jeanswear. Trend reports and sales propositions.
sentences.cn: 内容包括德国法兰克福服装展会动态宣传及介绍, 纺织服装发布会信息,色彩趋势预测,最新行业报告.

sentences.en: There are ways though to add some flare and pop the appearance of your typical menswear.
sentences.cn: 有办法,虽然增加一些爆发和流行的男装的典型外观.

sentences.en: What is the most underrated item in menswear and women swear?
sentences.cn: 什么是男装及女装最被低估的项目?

sentences.en: You're having a garage sale featuring menswear and sporting equipment.
sentences.cn: 你怎么连我的衣服和运动器材都卖?

trans.tran_en: clothing for men – used especially in shops
